meanings.definition: A device used in construction to anchor structures or provide support.
meanings.sent1: The deadmen were essential for keeping the wall sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers used deadmen to secure the foundation of the building.
meanings.sent3: The deadmen in the ground held the structure in place like strong roots.
meanings.sent4: The deadmen acted as anchors, preventing the structure from shifting.
meanings.sent5: The deadmen were like invisible hands holding the building steady.

meanings.definition: A group of men who have died in battle or other tragic circumstances.
meanings.sent1: The deadmen were honored for their bravery on the battlefield.
meanings.sent2: The memorial honored the deadmen who sacrificed their lives for their country.
meanings.sent3: The ghostly deadmen gathered around the campfire, sharing stories of valor.
meanings.sent4: The fallen deadmen stood as a reminder of the cost of war.
meanings.sent5: The image of the deadmen lingered in the minds of those who witnessed the battle.
